title: Graduate from High School
description: I graduated from the Charia High School with a SSC in Humanities and a computer in optional.

title: Admission to Versity
description: I was accepted to the National Polytechnic Institute (NPI) in the Computer Technology.

title: Left Collage
description: I was learning a lot and started freelancing as web designer, soon after I decided to focus on web design skills and did not attend 4th semester final example.

title: Getting First Job as Web Designer
description: I started working as a web designer at a multinational company. It was my first job and I was so excited to join there. At that time I was 18.5 years old.

title: Left Jobs and started Affiliate Marketing
description: Starting of 2018, I was learning PHP to become a full-stack web developer. Eventually I started a amazon affiliate marketing as a side project and I wasn't doing good enough. On July 2018 I decided to leave the company and focus on my side project.

title: Started Freelancing as Full-stack Developer
description: My side project didn't do well, after 2 months of doing or so I got demotivated and decided to focus on learning Laravel, PHP & Mysql. After 5 months of learning I started freelancing as a full-stack web developer in Feburary, 2019.

title: Hired First Employee
description: I was doing a fulltime job and a partime job. Besides this I got project offer worth of $4000 usd and I couldn't resist that offer. It was my biggest project so far and I pretty confident I can finish. I was so busy and I hired someone to work with me.

title: Created My First Software Company
description: My first hiring didn't go well and I decided to start a company after discussing with my friend Khayrul Shanto. At that time, Khyrul was learning PHP & Laravel from me and he helped me a lot with brainstroming how we can get started and we did after 2 months of working together.

title: Dropout from Collage
description: My family, friends push me a lot to complete Diploma (at least). After failing in 4th semester for 2 times, I wasn't ready to pay 25 thousand BDT for 3rd time attempt, specially when my business was not doing well. I decided to drop out from collage and start a new life.

title: Getting Married
description: I was so frustrated running a company, working with clients, working on my side projects echotemplate, codeshikhi & templatecookie. I couldn't help myself as I was engaged computer related acitivies 24/7. I decided to get married and I am so happy to be married.

title: Closeing Zakirsoft
description: I am closing my first company Zakirsoft after almost 2 years of working on it. I had started with my friends and family. It has a emotional attachment with me. I did so many mistakes, I have many projects on my hand, My life, routine is not organized at all. It is time to get everything in order, I want to focus few specific personal/professional projects.
